name: Old Content Restored
description:
- Restores items and monsters that have been removed or changed too much.  
- This is a sub-mod of Cataclysm Restored, 
- install Cataclysm Restored FULL for the complete package.  
- ANBC and AEP suits can be dropped by Hazmat Zombies again.
- Chicken Walker and Tank Drone can spawn again.
-  Small buffs to makeshift crowbar, cudgel, and quarterstaff. 
- Known Issues:
- This barely touches the surface of removed content, theres much more work to be done.
